pgrid.interfaces.index
Class PGridIndex

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.interfaces.index.PGridIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Index
public class PGridIndex
extends Object
implements Index

Defines the operations that the storage layer supports. It includes standard data (search, insert, delete, update) operations and registration of callbacks associated with them.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Constructor Detail

PGridIndex

protected PGridIndex()
The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created. A client that tries to instantiate PGridIndexManager directly will get an error at compile-time.

Method Detail

sharedInstance

public static PGridIndex sharedInstance()
This creates the only instance of this class. This differs from the C++ standard implementation by Gamma et.al. since Java ensures the order of static initialization at runtime.

Returns:
the shared instance of this class.
See Also:
Lazy instantiation - Balancing performance and resource usage

init

public void init(P2P p2p)
Initializes the P-Grid facility.

Parameters:
p2p - the P2P facility.

addIndexListener

public void addIndexListener(IndexListener listener,
                             Type type)
Register a listener of events related to data items. Such listeners are notified when operations on items on the the current node are requested.

Specified by:
addIndexListener in interface Index
Parameters:
listener - the listener to register
type - the type of data items that the listener is interested in

removeIndexListener

public void removeIndexListener(IndexListener listener,
                                Type type)
Removed a registered listener.

Specified by:
removeIndexListener in interface Index
Parameters:
listener - the listener to register
type - the type of data items that the listener is interested in

search

public void search(Query query,
                   SearchListener listener)
            throws NoSuchTypeException,
                   NoRouteToKeyException
Search the network for matching items. Implemented as an asynchronous operation, because search might take some time. Callback is notified for each new result.

Specified by:
search in interface Index
Parameters:
query - the query used to specify the search
listener - an object to notify when results arrive
Throws:
NoSuchTypeException - if the provided Type is unknown.
NoRouteToKeyException - if the query cannot be routed to a responsible peer.

search

public void search(Query query,
                   SearchListener listener,
                   GUID guid)
            throws NoSuchTypeException,
                   NoRouteToKeyException
Search the network for matching items. Implemented as an asynchronous operation, because search might take some time. Callback is notified for each new result.
This method register the given listener for the give GUID. Use this method if you are only interested in binding a listener to a query reference GUID and not the query GUID itself.

Parameters:
query - the query used to specify the search
listener - an object to notify when results arrive
guid - the guid used for registerating the listener. If null, no listener is registered
Throws:
NoSuchTypeException - if the provided Type is unknown.
NoRouteToKeyException - if the query cannot be routed to a responsible peer.

update

public void update(Collection items)
Updates the dataitems into the network, if the items with such ID's already exist, they will be rewritten

Specified by:
update in interface Index
Parameters:
items - the collection of data items

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shutdowns the storage service.

Specified by:
shutdown in interface Index
